dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am Frostreaver, the Frozen Spectral Dragon. What brings you to these cursed lands?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to challenge the Shadow Legion and bring light to this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, a bold one, are you? The Shadow Legion does not take kindly to intruders.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no quarrel with you, mighty dragon. Let us each go our separate ways.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmph. Wise decision. The Frostreaver has no interest in minor skirmishes.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I bid you farewell then, Frostreaver. May our paths never cross again.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Indeed. Our encounter ends here. Remember, the shadows hold many dangers.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Is there anything you can tell me about the Shadow Legion's weaknesses?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curious one, aren't you? Very well, I shall enlighten you on their vulnerabilities.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am prepared to face any challenge, including the mighty Frostreaver.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery alone will not save you, foolish mortal. The Frostreaver's chill is relentless.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you, Frostreaver! Let's see who emerges victorious.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You have sealed your fate. Prepare to feel the icy wrath of Frostreaver!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I... I was mistaken. I am not ready for this battle. I retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! An unexpected display of cowardice. I shall let you live this day.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense a great power within you, Frostreaver. Will you aid me in my quest against darkness?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You have good intuition, adventurer. Perhaps an alliance could benefit us both.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we shall strike fear into the Shadow Legion and bring hope to this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A formidable pact indeed. The Frostreaver shall stand by your side in this endeavor.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have changed my mind. I will face the Shadow Legion alone.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. The Frostreaver has no need for unreliable companions.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no business with you, dragon. Leave me be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impudent fool! The Frostreaver demands respect in these lands.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Apologies, Frostreaver. I meant no disrespect. I shall take my leave immediately.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies accepted, but remember this encounter. The Frostreaver's memory is long.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You dare to challenge me, Frostreaver? Prepare for a battle you won't soon forget.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a petty challenger. The Frostreaver shall enjoy this display of futility.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will vanquish you, Frostreaver! Let our battle begin!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, you have sealed your fate. The Frostreaver's frost will consume you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I... I think I underestimated your power, Frostreaver. I beg for mercy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pathetic. The Frostreaver shows no mercy to the weak. Prepare for your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge, Frostreaver. Will you share your wisdom with me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, and power demands sacrifice. What are you willing to offer, seeker?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my strength and loyalty in exchange for your guidance, Frostreaver.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An intriguing proposal. Strength and loyalty are rare commodities. We may have a deal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Our alliance shall bring terror to our enemies, Frostreaver. Let us conquer together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance of terror it shall be. The Frostreaver sees potential in this dark union.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I've changed my mind. I will seek knowledge elsewhere. Farewell, Frostreaver.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. The Frostreaver remains in solitude, guarding its icy secrets.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have nothing to offer but my questions, Frostreaver. Will you answer them?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Questions are cheap, answers are priceless. Ask, but be prepared for the cost.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about the Shadow Legion. Can you enlighten me, Frostreaver?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The Shadow Legion's shadows run deep. To face them is to invite oblivion upon oneself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I think I will find my answers elsewhere. Your price is too high, Frostreaver.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge comes at a cost, seeker. The Frostreaver remains indifferent to your departure.
